dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1281 IH: To extend the authorization of the Highlands Conservation Act.

action.action-desc: Mr. Frelinghuysen introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To extend the authorization of the Highlands Conservation Act.

section.text: Section 4(e) of the Highlands Conservation Act (Public Law 108â€“421; 118 Stat. 2377) is amended by striking 2014 and inserting 2021.
